source: Sports Betting RLM Research (Action Network, Sports Insights)
title: Reverse Line Movement (RLM)
mechanism: Reverse Line Movement occurs when price moves OPPOSITE to the popular trade direction. This indicates that smaller sharp bets are overpowering larger public bets. In Kalshi, if many small YES trades occur but price drifts toward NO, the few large NO trades may be smart money.

proposed_signal.condition: >70% of trades are YES but price moved toward NO (or vice versa)
proposed_signal.action: Follow the price direction, not the trade count direction

novelty_vs_tested: We tested trade direction consensus but NOT divergence between trade count and price movement
